Reviews.Title: “Serenity in the Middle of the City”
Reviews.Author: Eddychahine
Reviews.Content: It is kind of apparmtents and you feel like you are really at home with homemade breakfast. Rooms are big and internet is for free. I enjoyed a lot my stay specially that you can have the main key entrance and you room's key. It is your home away from home. Sure I will come back.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient location, good price/quality”
Reviews.Author: SissyBar
Reviews.Content: Close to S-Bahn station. Close to many excellent restaurants. Close to Kurfürstendamm for those who like to shop. Nice, cosy, spacious (also vertcally) room with big enough bathroom and lots of space for clothes etc. Very good breakfast. (Not included.) Friendly staff. Quiet, safe location. But, check-out already at 10.00 a.m. And you can only pay cash.

Reviews.Title: “Good location, little pension, great place to stay in Berlin.”
Reviews.Author: Lenmex09
Reviews.Content: We stayed just for one night at this little pension in July, but we will definitely stay there again when will go back to Berlin. The room was clean, spacious, renovated, the staff friendly - the older man was not able to speak English, but the young lady was helpful and tried to explain everything and make our stay easier. The location was great, close to city centre and walking distance to U Bahn and S Bahn. Good value for money.

Reviews.Title: “NOT SERIOUS!!”
Reviews.Author: gio0MILANO
Reviews.Content: I contacted by phone the hotel and asked for the availibility of a double room for the period I needed...they answered affirmatively and asked me to send an e-mail telling they would have replied in the afternoon. I then booked my FLIGHT COUNTING ON the reservation. In the afternoon they replied telling that no room was availible!!! I asked for explanations and they replied that a person had booked in the meanwhile!!!! REALLY NOT SERIOUS!!!

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay in a quiet neighborhood”
Reviews.Author: Rbakken
Reviews.Content: Our group of 3 stayed at the Pension Al Vita, after looking at numerous other options in Berlin. It was in a residential area of Berlin in a quiet neighborhood, and within a 15-20 minute walk of the train station. The close proximity to local eating establishments was also good, and we were able to sample an authentic local taste in atmosphere. It will help you if you know a little German to interact with the hotel staff, but we managed without too much difficulty. Our room was spacious and roomy, with plenty of room to relax and unwind from a long day. Would definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Average”
Reviews.Author: apprezzarevita
Reviews.Content: The young lady during day shift is awesome and wonderfully helpful. Unfortunatly, the evening staff does not speak english, so we had a rough check in. The Bathroom was akward and my boyfriend hit his head on the door on more than one occasion. Location is great though, close to a U train and an S train.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay!”
Reviews.Author: birilloGermany
Reviews.Content: We recently came back from a 3 day vacation in Berlin, we found this lovely hotel very charming and a great value for our money. Our triple room was very spacious: it actually had a separate room for the 3rd bed, high ceilings, very tall windows, airy, extremely clean, very nicely decorated. The bathroom was a little small but it served its purpose. We really enjoyed our stay and the gracious host Susanne made sure my kids had everyting they needed. The gentleman who checked us in did not speak any English but we managed to understand each other. This lovely hotel is very close to the centre of the cityand very well connected to the rest of Berlin as the S-Bahn stop (Savignyplatz) is just around the corner from the hotel. Breakfast is to be paid on the side (7 euros per person), but they did not charge my 2 year old and it had a good selection. We will definately go back!

Reviews.Title: “Sweet little pension”
Reviews.Author: Foca_Blanca
Reviews.Content: Nice little B&B with good location and peaceful neighbourhood. Staff german speaking but willing to help and friendly. Good value for money.
